name: The Little Square
description:
You were a little square. Created...somewhere. You don't even know who you are. But there's some sort of..path. Hope that path leads to good. Your objective is to reach the end. Do you accept or decline? Up to you.

Made by Rehan Sanish 

Controls: 

Left to Right Movement: A-D keys, or Left-Right Arrow keys 

Jump: W key or Spacebar
